channel.title: Fishing timer

item.title: Fishing timer
item.dc:creator: @Rockin Rockin
item.description:
@Rockin wrote:

I’m adding fishing to my delta source. But, as of now it can be massed clicked, and I don’t know how to get a timer for delta. Here’s my fishing code:

else if (NPCID == 1399) { // lobs for(int lob = 0; lob < 28; lob++); if(playerLevel[10] >= 40); if(timer <= 0); timer -= 5; addItem(377, 1); startAnimation(619); addSkillXP(250, 10); sM("You catch a Lobster"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if(playerLevel[10] <= 40) { sM("You need a fishing level of 40 to catch Lobsters"); }

The timer I put it in there doesn’t work.

Also, I have some ints declared.

public static int timer = 0;

Read full topic
